EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_Welcome Nurture_Q119.4 - Why not try it out for yourself?
EmailTemplate.subject: Why not try it out for yourself?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’d like to formally invite you to sign-up for a free trial of Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://run.pivotal.io/]]>, and push code to an app platform running .NET core!
And of course, please stay in touch with the Pivotal team by subscribing to our weekly newsletter <[[https://pivotal.io/newsletter-subscription]]> or meet us at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events]]>!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
© 2019 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. <[[http://info.pivotal.io/ZUA000ARC0000000V20NJI0]]> Unsubscribe <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWmpkak16QTFOVGhpTmpNeSIsInQiOiJWT004WEh6MEVjajlvZG1zQlRiOXlKbkNvVDdEckZjMGZXQTh1OEhwdlpKNUVKbFhmd29SbTFEcVZGQWpzTzA1XC9reTE3MzJcLzZuWGl2bUpoXC83dncwdz09In0%253D?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]>.
